site.description: This update site allows you to install the latest version of the Jumble Test Analysis plugin into Eclipse. (In Eclipse, use Help / Install New Software, then Add this site to install the Jumble plugin). After installing the plugin, right click on a Java class and use the "Jumble Mutation Tester" menu entry to analyze how well that class is tested.
